channel.title: [Easy] How To Make Teleports [Easy]
channel.description:
Today I'm Going To Help You With the Making Of A Teleport (::example) How Hard Is This? 1/10 Very Easy First Let Me Introduce Myself As Fillost Pronounced [Fill-Host] I am A Beginner In JavaScript And Html So If I Mess Up On Something Please Don't Be Afraid to Point it out ;) Back to the Tutorial
Step 1: In Your Source Look For "Client.Java" And Open It Up
Step 2: Hit CTRL+F And Search "home" Til you Find Something Like this
if(command.startsWith("home") && playerRights >= 0){ toX = ####; toY = ####; }
Step 3: Copy The Code From ( if ) To The Break ( } )
Step 4: Click right next to the Break and hit "Enter" Paste The Code
Step 5: Edit The
toX = ####; toY = ####;
And Change The #### to the Coords you Want to Teleport to.
If you do not know how to find "Coords" Please [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,486178.0.html]Click Here[/url]
Step 6: Change The "home" to Whatever You Wish
Step 7: Save And Compile
Step 8: Go test it out!
If The Tutorial Didn't work for you Please Let Me Know This Is My First Tutorial I've Ever Posted So I Hope It Helps!

item.title: [Easy] How To Make Teleports [Easy]
item.dc:creator: @Fillost Fillost
item.description:
@Fillost wrote:

Today I’m Going To Help You With the Making Of A Teleport (::example)
How Hard Is This? 1/10 Very Easy
First Let Me Introduce Myself As Fillost Pronounced [Fill-Host]
I am A Beginner In JavaScript And Html So If I Mess Up On Something Please Don’t Be Afraid to Point it out Back to the Tutorial

Step 1: In Your Source Look For “Client.Java” And Open It Up

Step 2: Hit CTRL+F And Search “home” Til you Find Something Like this

if(command.startsWith(“home”) && playerRights >= 0){
toX = ####;
toY = ####;
}

Step 3: Copy The Code From ( if ) To The Break ( } )

Step 4: Click right next to the Break and hit “Enter” Paste The Code

Step 5: Edit The

toX = ####;
toY = ####;

And Change The #### to the Coords you Want to Teleport to.

If you do not know how to find “Coords” Please Click Here

Step 6: Change The “home” to Whatever You Wish

Step 7: Save And Compile

Step 8: Go test it out!

If The Tutorial Didn’t work for you Please Let Me Know This Is My First Tutorial I’ve Ever Posted So I Hope It Helps!

Read full topic
